article_title: Forgotten Child Fund Events Planned For Sunday
article_text:
Saturday, October 10, 2015

There will be two Forgotten Child Fund activities on Sunday.

The Chattanooga Crappie Club is hosting the 11th annual Forgotten Child fFund Crappie Tournament at Chester Frost Park. Officials said, "This is a wonderful event that has helped to buy toys so a child is not forgotten at Christmas."

2 p. m. m. Weigh in will be at Chester Frost Park at
